body:
### Contact Details (e.g. Tox ID or email)

_No response_

### qTox Version

1.18.2

### Commit Hash

ac1a16ec0bb7ef1f9bbd494a076e661b05937d08

### Toxcore Version

 

### Qt Version

 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Start qTox
2. Wait a few seconds...
3. Crash!

### Observed Behavior

The app crashed.

Apple crash log:

### Expected Behavior

Not to crash.

### Reproducibility

Always

### Operating System

macOS

### Operating System version/distro/name/etc.

MacOS 14.4.1

### Relevant log output

title: [Bug]: MacOS ARM version crashing randomly
